Title: Under the Sun of Satan
Writer: Georges Bernanos (novel), Sylvie Pialat (scenario), Maurice Pialat (adaptation)
Actors: Gérard Depardieu, Sandrine Bonnaire, Maurice Pialat, Alain Artur
Plot: A priest stuck in a rural congregation and burdened with his overwrought spirituality, finds purpose in a troubled woman accused of murder.
